item.title: The Hidden Cost of Leading Alone: Breaking the Isolation Tax
item.description: There’s a tax nobody tells you about when you start building something. It doesn’t show up on your P&L. No accountant will flag it. But it compounds quietly in the background, bleeding momentum from everything you’re trying to create. I call it the Isolation Tax. It’s the …
